SnapshotOraclev11g.name: VM_CELULA
SnapshotOraclev11g.subquery:
SELECT nome_celula,
id_municipio,
longitude,
latitude,
listagg(servico,';') within GROUP (
ORDER BY nome_celula) tecnologias
FROM
(SELECT UNIQUE celula.estacao_id AS nome_celula,
mun.ibge AS id_municipio,
celula.longitude,
celula.latitude,
setor.tecnologia AS servico
FROM VW_MAPVIEW_ESTACAO_LOCATION celula
INNER JOIN VW_MAPVIEW_MUNICIPIO mun ON celula.ibge = mun.ibge
INNER JOIN VW_MAPVIEW_ESTACAO_SITE site on site.estacao = celula.estacao_id
INNER JOIN VW_MAPVIEW_CELL setor ON setor.SITEID = site.site_id
)
GROUP BY nome_celula,
id_municipio,
longitude,
latitude
